price: Sila keeyyattoonni kiyya isin irratti dubbifamaa turtee, isin ishee sobsiisaa hin turree?
arabic: أَلَمۡ تَكُنۡ ءَايَٰتِي تُتۡلَىٰ عَلَيۡكُمۡ فَكُنتُم بِهَا تُكَذِّبُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: alam takun āyātī tut'lā ʿalaykum fakuntum bihā tukadhibūna
